label: AB2_mC6_12_a_i-004
title: $\alpha$-HgO$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
HgO$_{2}$ exists as \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_mC6_12_a_i-004}{monoclinic $\alpha$-HgO} (this structure) and \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP12_61_a_c-001}{orthorhombic $\beta$-HgO$_{2}$}. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_mC6_12_a_i-001}{$C34$ Calverite}, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_mC6_12_a_i-004}{$\alpha$-HgO2} (this structure), and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_mC6_12_a_i-003}{NiO$_{2}$} have the same AFLOW prototype label, AB2\_mC6\_12\_a\_i. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
